data.text:
The rooms at the higher floors (we were on the 26th) are very spacious and quiet, fully meet expectations of 5 star luxury resort hotel. there were renovations ongoing in neighboring rooms which affected air at the floor area. 25th floor was all fine. 
Service was excellent and personnel were generally very friendly and helpful. The waiter Asila from Ginger Moon was fantastic, always making sure we had a special experience at this place. Prajwol and Amal from Ginger moon were also very good. 
Food at buffet places (Mina Kitchen and Latest Recipe) was good. We rated fish taverna as the best among the in house restaurants. 
Beach experience was affected by nearby construction that created noise but overall was very good. Beach infrastructure is shared between three hotels W, Le Meridien and Westin. Lots of things to do and enjoy. 
Location is top between marina and palm jumeira. 
We enjoyed our time at W on our family vacation.
data.title: Family vacation at W Hotel Mina Seyahi

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello armanb2013,
Thank you for your detailed feedback! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay. It's fantastic to hear our service met your expectations, and we'll pass on your praise to Asila, Prajwol, and Amal. We're glad you enjoyed our dining options, especially Fish Taverna. While we regret any noise from nearby construction, we're pleased you had a good beach experience. We appreciate your review, your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the W soon!
All my best,
Micaela
Director of Quality
owner_response.author: Micaela Newton

data.text:
Everything was brilliant! 
Highly recommend. 
The hotel has great amenities, very close to the beach which is great. 
The views are incredible, room service is great and the valet staff are amazing 
Priyanshu was great, very attentive and helped with our room cleaning. 
Such a kind gentleman
data.title: Highly recommend

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Veronas989,
Thank you immensely for your glowing review! We're overjoyed to hear that you found everything about your stay to be brilliant and that you highly recommend our hotel. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed our great amenities. We're also thrilled that you found our room service to be excellent and that our valet staff made a positive impression on you.

Your special mention of Priyanshu warms our hearts! We're delighted that he provided attentive service and assisted with your room cleaning. He truly embodies the kind and dedicated spirit that we strive for in our team members.

Thank you again for your kind words and recommendation. We can't wait to welcome you back for another memorable stay!
All my best,
Micaela
Director of Quality
owner_response.author: Micaela Newton

data.text:
Very nice hotel 
The facilities and the design and the iftar buffet nearby also you can use the pools of the other hotels next to it and the staff is lovely especially the cleaning team priyanshu 
Thanks we ll come back !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
data.title: Very nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello manaellea2024,
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you appreciated our facilities, design, and the nearby iftar. We're especially grateful for your kind words about our lovely staff, including Priyanshu from the cleaning team. We can't wait to welcome you back for another fantastic stay!
All my best,
Micaela
Director of Quality

data.text:
Amazing hotel, very stylish and new with great food and with a super friendly staff!

I stayed eight nights and after a short trip to Oman I came back (!)  to the same hotel another five nights because I felt like home there.
I will miss the people working there, they been like friends&family to meüôèüèª 

First Pragadi & Agascha and also Lisa, Assila and ALL the others from the breakfast team - I will remember  you forever!
I did not experience such a warm, personal and professional service before. How can I have breakfast in the future without them welcoming me?

At the reception desk Erika, Safaq and Dani have been a sunshine every time I met them with an incredible personal and heartful helpfulness. They did more than I ever expected and have been a beaming welcome every time I arrived or passed by!
Can‚Äôt believe how professional and personal Safaqs service was in her first month working there!

My room was cleaned to perfection every day by Ravindu, thank you too broüôèüèª

The whole team at the W Mina Seyahi is an exceptional friendly and professional family! You guys are amazingüôèüèª

I have tears in my eyes leaving this beautiful placeüôèüèª
data.title: Style meets Soul

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Traveler04699400731,
Thank you deeply for your heartfelt feedback! We're thrilled that you found our hotel to be a welcoming home during your stay. It's incredibly touching to hear about the positive impact our staff, including Pragadi, Agascha, Lisa, Assila, Erika, Safaq, Dani, and Ravindu, had on your experience. Your kind words mean the world to us and we'll be sure to share your appreciation with them. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future to create more wonderful memories together. Safe travels, and until next time!
All my best,
Micaela
Director of Quality
owner_response.author: Micaela Newton

data.text: The atmosphere was very  pleasant and comfortable.... me and my husband love the hotel facilities and  caring staff .... priyanshu took care of our room  very well ........ staying in this hotel is like staying in a Paradise. We appreciate it a lot.
data.title: Happy place
